lead_paragraph: Checks, please! Burberry, Paul Smith and Coach make those wonderful old British patterns – plaid, herringbone, houndstooth and such – new again.

headline.main: How to Dress Like an Aristocrat (Without the Itch)

snippet: Checks, please! Burberry, Paul Smith and Coach make those wonderful old British patterns – plaid, herringbone, houndstooth and such – new again....
abstract: Menswear designers are taking starchiness out of plaids, tweeds and other classic patterns this fall and giving them casual and more youthful look.
